name: LeGatour
description:
12/07/2018: Currently the fourth build of LeGatour, available only to campaign supporters of Catarse campaign, or supporting with US$ 3 or more below.

If you desire to pay for file access through itch.io be advised THIS IS NOT A COMPLETE GAME, in fact is pretty much just a concept that's not even close to be finished. Anyway, if you pay the minimum to download it, I will consider you a supporter tier 1 and will grant you access to ALL future releases. Higher values, of course, are always appreciated, since as a indie developer, I can freely reward loyal players in many other games to come.

Game Designed by Douglas d'Aquino
any question or requests, contact me through LeGatour Facebook Page
or contact me at: douglas.daquino@gmail.com

Cat Sprites: Shepardskin
